autodeleteFiltersInfo:
You can choose from a wide variety of filters and combine them in any way you like.
To delete all messages, don't select any filters.
You can also configure whether a message must meet all filters or only at least one filter within a category in order to be deleted.
autodeleteInfo:
EazyAutodelete deletes messages based on user-created **configs**. A config only applies to **the channel in which you ran the command**. You can create up to %s configs per channel, with the [Premium version](https://eazyautodelete.xyz/premium) even more.

1. Run </setup:1069983727855349797> and select "Create Config" to create a new config.

2. You can choose **different modes** for your config. If you wish to delete each message after x seconds, use mode 1. If you wish to delete all messages every x seconds, use mode 2. There are more modes to try out. Read more about them [here](https://docs.eazyautodelete.xyz/config/modes).

3. Once you have selected a mode, you can select **as many filters as you like**. In addition, you can set certain roles to be targeted or ignored as well as automatically applying your configs to new threads and so much more.

4. Finally, you select a limit value for your config. Depending on the mode, this is either a **duration or an amount of messages**.

5. After changing your config, EazyAutodelete will ask you whether you want to **load old messages**. If you wish messages that were sent before you set up the bot in this channel to be deleted, select yes, otherwise select no.

And that's it. Your good to go. After one minute, EazyAutodelete will start working just as you configured it to.
autodeleteIntro:
Willkommen bei **EazyAutodelete**! üéâ

Ich bin ein vollst√§ndig anpassbarer Discord-Bot, der basierend auf deinen Einstellungen automatisch Nachrichten l√∂scht.

Hier erf√§hrst du, wie ich funktioniere und wie du mich ganz einfach zum automatischen L√∂schen von Nachrichten auf deinem Server einrichten kannst.

Wenn du mich noch nicht zu deinem Server hinzugef√ºgt hast, lies bitte zuerst [__wie man mich zu deinem Server hinzuf√ºgt__] (https://docs.eazyautodelete.xyz/add-to-server)!

Wenn du irgendwelche Fragen oder Probleme hast, besuche unseren [Support-Server](https://eazyautodelete.xyz/support).
autodeleteLimitInfo:
The "limit" is the value with which the specified mode works.
For example, if you pick mode 3, the limit decides how many messages to wait before deleting them.
autodeleteModesInfo: The mode determines how this configuration works. It alters the way the deletion algorithm works.
autodeleteNoticeDescription: This server uses [**EazyAutodelete**](https://eazyautodelete.xyz) to automatically delete messages in this channel. The following autodelete configurations are active in this channel.
autodeleteNoticeError: Sending the Autodelete notice has failed. Please check whether I have the permission to send messages and use embed links.
autodeleteNoticeSuccess:
The Autodelete notice has been sent. Feel free to pin it.
EazyAutodelete will not delete that message, but you can delete or resend it at any time.
autodeleteNoticeTitle: Messages in this channel are automatically deleted
autodeleteOldMessagesInfo:
With EazyAutodelete, you can load messages from up to 14 days ago and process them as if EazyAutodelete had been configured the way it is now when the messages were sent.
You can choose to load old messages each time you edit the configuration.
This process may take a few minutes if there are many messages in the channel.
autodeleteStart: EazyAutodelete beginnt mit dem L√∂schen von Nachrichten entsprechend deiner Konfiguration eine Minute nach der letzten √Ñnderung.
automatedMessage: This is an automated message by <@%s>.
behaviorInfo:
W√§hle entweder
> 1) nur Nachrichten l√∂schen, die **MINDESTENS EINEM Filter** einer Kategorie entsprechen *oder*
> 2) nur Nachrichten zu l√∂schen, die **alle Filter** einer Kategorie erf√ºllen.
blockedForAbuse:
We suspect that you have abused our systems, which is why we have blocked you from accessing them and stopped all your configs.
This is purely a precautionary measure. However, if you believe this to be unjustified, please reach out to us via our [support server](%s), and we will endeavour to resolve the inconvenience.

premiumInfo:

rolesDesc: You can select roles to either target or ignore.

rolesInfo:
You can select roles to either target or ignore. This only works for user-created roles, not automatically created bot roles.

**Target Roles:**
Only delete messages from members with one or more of the roles.

**Ignore Roles:**
Ignore messages from members with one or more of the roles.
